name: rainbow swirl bucket hat
notes:
this is a step by step written pattern for the rainbow swirl bucket hat!

this is not the physical product, if you are interesting in getting the hat itself please check out my website passioknitgoods.com!

the hats finished circumference is about 23 inches

the pattern includes written instructions and detailed photos

you may sell finished items from this pattern but you must credit me as the designer and use your own photos
